Articles.Content:
First of all i\'d like to point out that I have been playing this game for 3 days and it\'s absolutely amazing. I will, in fact buy it in about a week, but until then I will have to resort to the demo version. This brings me to my main point. Is it somehow possible to run Mechjeb on the demo version of the game? I recently found out about this add-on and I\'d really want to give it a go. Perhaps there is an older version that I could download?

If there isn\'t, I suppose i\'ll just have to wait. 

Cheers!
Nope. only .14 right now can use it.

Plugin support was added in the most recent version of KSP. I\'m very sorry but you\'re gonna have to buy this amazing game! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

(MechJeb is a plugin)

It has been a great help for me to work-out what direction I need to burn to translate the orbit.

Thanks for the fast replys. I suppose I\'ll have some time to practise flying then ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) Almost got to the moon earlier!
On the other hand, any of the mods that aren\'t plugin-powered will work just fine in the demo version. 8) So you can download all kinds of extra parts.
